name: Typomancer
description:
Typomancer is a story-focused typing game set in a magical fantasy world. Play as the Typomancer and help your monster friends with your typing magic!

Intended to be played with a mouse and keyboard.

Typomancer was made as part of the Academy of Art University Game Design program in 6 weeks.

Team Members:

My-Linh Ha: Project Lead, Game Designer, Writer

Fengyang Zeng: Art Lead, Character Artist

Zheng Kang: Background, Prop Artist

Chen Han Liu: Animator
